info.name: GameFAQs v11 - GFPastel 2010.12.21
info.description: GFPastel is a modern stylesheet for the GameFAQs message boards (and the rest of the site).
info.additionalInfo:
GFPastel requires either the use of the GameFOX extension for Firefox/GameChrome extension for Chrome, and requires that GameFAQs stylesheets be disabled through their Style menus.
